newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-CAMINERO DOUBLE-STRIKE LIFTS ATLETICO TO THIRD.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-CAMINERO DOUBLE-STRIKE LIFTS ATLETICO TO THIRD.

text.p: International midfielder Jose Luis Caminero scored twice to lead Atletico Madrid to an important 3-2 victory over Sevilla on Saturday which lifted the Spanish champions to provisional third place.
Caminero, who had struggled to hit form in recent weeks, found the mark twice in five minutes mid-way through the first half as Atletico recovered from an early Sevilla strike.
Ahead of other weekend fixtures, Atletico trail second- placed Barcelona by four points, and lead Real Betis and Deportivo Coruna by two.
